it doesn’t eliminate “Proxys” Or “Web-Proxys”

It actually does, because if they change IP with a proxy, they will be disconnected and therefore just have a different IP.
[/quote]
Then how about stopping this?

I got 4 computers, (they ain’t mine but they are my brothers)
I can use each of them to login into your server
And i can use mine too, i could just change ip on all comps and login, plain simple easy

Remember people can still figure stuff out, There is programs that you can buy from sites or download from torrent sites :D[/quote]

o.o

Gimmie a non-virus link for an IP changer, I want one hell bad, kick the shit out of 2speced ^.^

item.title: Canownueasy's Ultimate Referal System
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Davidi2:

I don’t think the online time is a good system. It’s easy for someone to just get on a different account and wait 30 minutes. Perhaps make the condition total level? It would also eliminate the online time variables.

Yes, but in my server it’s 1 connection per IP, which eliminates cheating the system, well unless they want to wait 3000 minutes just to get 100 points lolz.

item.title: Canownueasy's Ultimate Referal System
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

[center]

Ultimate Referal System
By Canownueasy (Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS)

Firstly, declare these intergers in class Player.

public int onlineTime; public int didRefer; public int referPoints;

Next, in class client search for “boolean process”

In this boolean, add this.

onlineTime++;

What this does is add onlineTime.

Now, search for

characterfile.write("character-height = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(playerPass, 0, playerPass.length()); characterfile.newLine();

Under that, add this.

characterfile.write("character-onlineTime = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(onlineTime), 0, Integer.toString(onlineTime).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-didRefer = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(didRefer), 0, Integer.toString(didRefer).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-referPoints = ", 0, 24); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(referPoints), 0, Integer.toString(referPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

That saves the interger values to the character file.

Now, we need to make it load the interger upon log in.

Search for if (token.equals("character-height")) { heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Under that add this.

} else if (token.equals("character-onlineTime")) { onlineTime = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-didRefer")) { didRefer = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-referPoints")) { referPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Now it loads the interger on log in.

Next, what we need to do is add some commands.

Find “void customCommand”

Under that add these.

This is for actual refering.

if (command.startsWith("refer")) { if (onlineTime >= 216000) { if (didRefer == 0) { client refer = null; for (int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++) { if (server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (command.substring(6).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)) { if (command.substring(6) != playerName) { refer = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i]; refer.sM(""+playerName+" has just reffered you!"); refer.sM("You were just rewarded 25M & 1 Refer Point!"); refer.addItem(995,25000000); refer.referPoints++; refer.savegame(false); sM("You reffered "+refer.playerName+"."); didRefer = 1; savegame(false); } else { sM("You cannot refer yourself!"); } } } } } else { sM("You already refered somebody!"); } } else { sM("You must have been playing for at least 30 minutes to refer somebody."); if (onlineTime >= 60) { sM("So far, you have played for "+onlineTime/2/60+" minutes."); } else { sM("So far, you have played for "+onlineTime/2+" seconds."); } } }

This is for a refer help guide.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("referhelp")) { sendQuest("@dre@Referal Handbook", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("By refering another player they earn", 8147); sendQuest("25 million gold coins, and 1 refer point!", 8148); sendQuest("You can spend refer points on PK items", 8149); sendQuest("Or save up for 100 refer points, giving mod!", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); sendQuest("To prevent misuse of this feature,", 8152); sendQuest("you must have played at least @red@30 minutes", 8153); sendQuest("until you can refer someone.", 8154); sendQuest("Also note, you can only refer", 8155); sendQuest("@red@ONE @blk@person!", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("To refer somebody use this command", 8158); sendQuest("@cya@::refer name_here", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("Be @gre@SURE@blk@ to replace @blu@name_here", 8161); sendQuest("With that person's name.", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Congradulations! Canownueasy’s Ultimate Referal System is now installed!

Read full topic
